name: CastCraft
description:
This is a dungeon crawling FPS game where there are puzzle solving issues in every level. The player is a caster, mana is limited per level and the player has to intelligently cast spells that allow them to progress through in a safe manner. If the player gets hit, the level restarts, so the game must be played intelligently. One core mechanic the dungeon characters move only when you move. 

Currently in prototype phase.
